Interface IStrategy

    java.io.Serializable

extends java.io.Serializable
    The Interface of Strategy
    Version:
    2.2
    Author:
    hcanta

    • Method Detail

      • reinforce

        Tuple<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> reinforce()
        Performs a reinforce check
        Returns:
        The country to reinforce and the amount of army to reinforce it with

      • fortify

        Tuple<java.lang.String,Tuple<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer>> fortify()
        Performs a fortify operation
        Returns:
        a tuple containing the origin and a tuple containing the destination and the amount of army to move

      • attack

        Tuple<java.lang.String,Tuple<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer>> attack()
        Decides which country to attack
        Returns:
        a tuple of size 2, where the first element is the origin (attacker) and the second is the destination of the attack (defender)

      • getWeakestNeighbour

        int getWeakestNeighbour(Territory territory)
        Finds the territory with the lowest army
        Parameters:
        territory - The current territory loaded from board
        Returns:
        the index of weakest neighbour territory

      • getStrongestTerritory

        int getStrongestTerritory()
        Finds the territory with the highest army for the respective players
        Returns:
        the index of strongest territory
